message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $15000.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $12000 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13500. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12500 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go below $14000, considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to make a compromise at $14000, but I think it's the lowest I can go.
I understand your position, but I believe we can find a middle ground. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13750, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $13250 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $13500, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is my final offer.
Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final price of $13000 for the product.
